CodeplexIssue.Title: SlideShowWindow.HWND Member not found
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
Just thought I'd try your NetOffice dll in place of PIA in my app but get the following exception in PowerPoint 2013 when trying to access: 
Presentation.SlideShowWindow.HWND
System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException HResult=-2147352573 Message=Member not found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80020003 (DISP_E_MEMBERNOTFOUND)) ErrorCode=-2147352573

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
This is a well-known bug from PowerPoint himself. In fact since PP95, not sure why its not fixed all the time.You can't use the HWND property regardless from any API(PIA, VSTO, NO..)
I suggest you find the window handle at hand(FindWindowEx for example)
*Sebastian

CodeplexComment.Author: mcm_ham
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: Weird, because it's been working fine for me in PIA v12 & v14 running Office XP to 2013 (sample attached).
